lite.name: Lite
lite.description: Essential workflow agents with core document and debugging skills
lite.useCase: Users wanting comprehensive workflow management with essential document processing and debugging capabilities
lite.targetUsers: Beginners, evaluators, users wanting balanced features with moderate footprint

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: Complete workflow and development team with enhanced testing and validation skills
standard.useCase: Professional development with full team coordination, testing, and comprehensive skill set

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Complete installation with all capabilities including advanced development, testing, and creative skills
pro.useCase: Full-featured installation for users needing all AI codegen, document processing, testing, debugging, and creative capabilities
pro.targetUsers: Power users, enterprises, teams requiring comprehensive feature set
